OCD.name: Extract Top Nodes
OCD.description: Extract the top N nodes from a graph, based on a given attribute

AD.name: Extract N top nodes
AD.description: Extracts this many of the top nodes from the graph

AD.name: Extract bottom nodes instead?
AD.description: Extract the bottom nodes instead of the top

AD.name: Numeric Attribute
AD.description: The attribute which the nodes will be sorted by

OCD.name: Extract Nodes Above or Below Value
OCD.description: Extract all nodes with an attribute strictly above a certain number

AD.name: Extract from this number
AD.description: Extracts all nodes above or below this attribute value

AD.name: Below?
AD.description: Extract nodes below this value instead of above?

AD.name: Numeric Attribute
AD.description: The attribute which the nodes will be sorted by

OCD.name: Extract Top Edges
OCD.description: Extract the top N edges from a graph, based on a given attribute

AD.name: Extract N top edges
AD.description: Extracts this many of the top edges from the graph

AD.name: Extract bottom edges instead?
AD.description: Extract the bottom edges instead of the top

AD.name: Numeric Attribute
AD.description: The attribute which the edges will be sorted by

OCD.name: Extract Edges Above or Below Value
OCD.description: Extract all edges with an attribute strictly above a certain number

AD.name: Extract from this number
AD.description: Extracts all edges above or below this attribute value

AD.name: Below?
AD.description: Extract edges below this value instead of above?

AD.name: Numeric Attribute
AD.description: The attribute which the edges will be sorted by
